txt.en: This looks like a good spot to light a flare
This spot no longer looks good
Borgar has gotten word that more dwarves are being readied to support the encampment at Jazârgund.

'Thank goodness you are here, [placeholder]. We are pressed to the limit. The Orcs here are being led by a vicious group of White Hand Uruks, whose knowledge and abilities have pressed us into a fight we cannot win with our current garrison.

'I sent word several days ago for help, but I am afraid they will not know the safest path to our camp. Here is a flint and some twigs. Light the cauldrons along the road to the east.

'When you have finished, return here to me.'
The cauldrons are to the east in Jundul-dûm.\n\nBorgar has asked you to light several cauldrons along the road leading east from Jazârgund.

'I can see the light from the cauldrons myself. Excellent work, [placeholder]. Hopefully the reinforcements will arrive soon.\n\n'In the meantime, there is plenty left for us to do while we are waiting.'
Borgar is at Jazârgund, west of Jundul-dûm.\n\nBorgar will be pleased to hear that the reinforcements he requested will now be able to find their way.
'Make sure all of those cauldrons are lit. I do not want our reinforcements getting lost in the dark.'
